Activity: Check for any follow-up emails from stakeholders post-meeting.
Schedule follow-up action items with the development team based on stakeholder feedback.
Send a summary report of the meetings to the team highlighting key outcomes and action items.
Hold a team meeting to discuss the outcomes from the stakeholder meetings and next steps.
Assign tasks for the upcoming weeks based on feedback received in the meetings.
Review project timeline and adjust milestones if necessary.
Send out meeting notes to all attendees for future reference.
